debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

showToggleEditRole.label: Show Toggle Edit To
showToggleEditRole.hint: A Toggle Edit button will be shown to all users with at least the selected role, allowing them to modify all locked settings. Note: Changing this option will not impact already opened character sheets. Players will need to close and re-open their character sheet to see this change.

lockBasicDetails.label: Lock Basic Details
lockBasicDetails.hint: Basic Details include Race, Background, Alignment, and Size

showBackgroundRole.label: Show Background To
showBackgroundRole.hint: A character's background will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

showAlignmentRole.label: Show Alignment To
showAlignmentRole.hint: A character's alignment will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

lockResources.label: Lock Resources
lockResources.hint: Locks the name, maximum value, and reset on short/long rest toggles for Resource 1, 2, and 3. This does not lock the current value for resources. If a resource is locked, has no name, and has a maximum of 0, it will be hidden.

showResource1Role.label: Show Resource 1 To
showResource1Role.hint: A character's Resource 1 will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

showResource2Role.label: Show Resource 2 To
showResource2Role.hint: A character's Resource 2 will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

showResource3Role.label: Show Resource 3 To
showResource3Role.hint: A character's Resource 3 will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

lockTraits.label: Lock Traits
lockTraits.hint: Traits include Senses, Languages, Immunities/Resistances/Vulnerabilities, Weapon/Armor/Tool Proficiencies, and Special Traits. If a trait is locked and has no value, it will be hidden.

lockLegendaryAndLair.label: Lock Legendary and Lair Actions
lockLegendaryAndLair.hint: Locks the maximum value for legendary actions and resistances, and the flag and initiative value for Uses Lair Action. The available value for Legendary Actions and Resistance is not locked. The Legendary and Lair rows are hidden when locked if the creature has no Legendary or Lair Actions.

showSpecialTraits.label: Show Special Traits
showSpecialTraits.hint: Show the list of Special Traits (Diamond Soul, Elven Accuracy, Attack Bonuses, etc) on the character sheet.

hideAddItemButtons.label: Hide Add Item Buttons
hideAddItemButtons.hint: If checked, the Add buttons are hidden on the Inventory, Features, and Spellbook tabs. Note: Items can still be added through Drag and Drop even when locked, and this does not impact the Duplicate option in the right-click menu.

hideRemoveItemButtons.label: Hide Delete Item Buttons
hideRemoveItemButtons.hint: If checked, the Delete buttons are hidden on the Inventory, Features, and Spellbook tabs. Note: This does not impact the Delete option in the right-click menu.

hideEmptySpellbook.label: Hide Empty Spellbooks
hideEmptySpellbook.hint: If checked, the Spellbook tab will be hidden when the character sheet is locked and the character has no spells, regardless of the Hide Add and Delete Item Buttons setting. If unchecked, the Spellbook tab for characters with no spells will be hidden or shown based on the Hide Add and Delete Item Buttons setting when the character sheet is locked.

hideEditItemButtons.label: Hide Edit Item Buttons
hideEditItemButtons.hint: This setting impacts Inventory, Features, and Spellbook tabs. Note: This does not impact the Edit option in the right-click menu.

disableItemContextMenu.label: Disable Item Context Menu
disableItemContextMenu.hint: This setting impacts Inventory, Features, and Spellbook tabs.

lockEquipItemButtons.label: Lock Equip Item Toggles
lockEquipItemButtons.hint: Note: This does not impact the Equip option in the right-click menu or in the Edit Item modal.

lockAvailableItemFeatureUses.label: Lock Available Item and Feature Uses

lockEffects.label: Lock Effects
lockEffects.hint: Note: This only impacts the Effects tab in the character sheet, and does not prevent players from adding/removing active effecits from the Token HUD.

showEffectsRole.label: Show Effects Tab To
showEffectsRole.hint: The Effects tab will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role. If Effects are locked, and a character has no effects (including inactive effects), the Effects tab will be hidden when the character sheet is locked regardless of this setting.

showBiographyRole.label: Show Biography To
showBiographyRole.hint: The Biography tab will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

lockUnsorteds.label: Lock Other Inputs
lockUnsorteds.hint: Locks Max Hit Points, Armor Class, Speed, Initiative Modifier, and Spellcasting Attribute. If you want to control any of these individually (or have any other issues with this module), please open an issue on this module's GitHub project page: https://github.com/illandril/FoundryVTT-sheet5e-lockdown

hideSheetConfigurationRole.label: Show Sheet Button To
hideSheetConfigurationRole.hint: The Sheet Configuration button in the header will be hidden (even when the character sheet is unlocked) from players who do not have at least the selected role.

notice.label: Notice (not a setting, read below)
notice.hint: Illandril's Character Sheet Lockdown has only partially been updated for D&D 5e 3.0.0 - it should work for the Legacy 5e Sheets, but it does not yet work for the new Default 5e Character Sheet. Because of how the new sheets are implemented, it may take a while before I add support, since adding support is non-trivial. If you like the new sheets and want to use them with this module, go to https://github.com/illandril/FoundryVTT-sheet5e-lockdown/issues/90 and let me know what settings you use so I can prioritize what people actually want.
